SEARCH
Package lib.uilib.framework

Class Widget

java.lang.Object
lib.uilib.framework.Widget
Direct Known Subclasses:
Align, Breadcrumbs, Column, Container, Menu, MultiTextInput, Pause, Table, Text, TextInput, VSpacer
public abstract class Widget extends Object
The abstract base class that represents the description of part of the user interface. Widgets can be composed together to build declarative user interfaces.
Since:
2024-11-10

  • Constructor Details

    • Widget

      public Widget()
      Default constructor for the Widget class. This constructor initializes a new instance of the Widget class with default values. Additional initialization logic can be added here if needed.

  • Method Details

    • build

      public abstract String build(BuildContext context)
      Describes the part of the widget represented by this widget. "Building" refers to constructing the actual text String to be printed onto the console, given the current BuildContext.
      Parameters:
      context - the context to build the widget with respect to.
      Returns:
      the built text string described by the widget.

    • paint

      public void paint(BuildContext context)
      Paints (prints) the widget's description of the user interface onto the console.
      Parameters:
      context - the context to build the widget with respect to.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth(BuildContext context)
      Gets the calculated width of the widget given the context. This is done by measuring the maximum line width of the built string.
      Parameters:
      context - the context to build the widget with respect to.
      Returns:
      the calculated width of the widget.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight(BuildContext context)
      Gets the calculated height of the widget given the context. This is done by measuring the number of lines of the built string.
      Parameters:
      context - the context to build the widget with respect to.
      Returns:
      the calculated height of the widget.

    • sanitiseRenderLine

      protected static String sanitiseRenderLine(String renderLine)
      A utility method to remove ANSI escape sequences from the built string as they interfere with the calculation of width and height. These escape sequences are used to render effects like color, text styles etc.
      Parameters:
      renderLine - the built string to sanitise.
      Returns:
      the sanitised string.
